data.text: @anurag_31177 @OfficialIGNOU @InnovationsIGN1 @uma_umamirun @COE_IGNOU @SrikantMoh @IgnouVc Dear Student, Please send your query with your Name, Programme Code and Enrolment Number to rcchennai@ignou.ac.in for immediate response.

@RCCHENNAI1 @OfficialIGNOU @InnovationsIGN1 @uma_umamirun @COE_IGNOU @SrikantMoh @IgnouVc Dear sir,

Can you let me know when the Examination will be conducted for the course Master of Hindi (ODL Mode) for the admissions taken in Dec-2021?

@RCCHENNAI1 @OfficialIGNOU @InnovationsIGN1 @uma_umamirun @COE_IGNOU @SrikantMoh @IgnouVc Sir, 
How can u take 4th Or 5th semester same time, delhi university take online exam why u shouldn't take online exam in corona time u give burdened all student, I cannot see any university take both semester exam in my entire life even Oxford University can't take both semester

@RCCHENNAI1 @OfficialIGNOU @InnovationsIGN1 @uma_umamirun @COE_IGNOU @SrikantMoh @IgnouVc 19th ko exam hoge ya nahi ?
Kyunki us din to holi hai !

@RCCHENNAI1 @OfficialIGNOU @InnovationsIGN1 @uma_umamirun @COE_IGNOU @SrikantMoh @IgnouVc I don't understand where was this so called following of the protocals..because our invigilators were not even wearing a mask..speaking ,giggling,taking, watching reels..and enjoying there life..jo aata tha vo bhi bhula diya. @OfficialIGNOU system is being nonsence day by day.
